article_text:
BlackBerry Ltd. isn't just losing its franchise in smartphones. It also faces tough competition in its business helping firms manage employees' devices.

Highlighting the threat to the area BlackBerry's Enterprise Server once dominated, rival startups are quickly adding customers and raising more capital, taking advantage of a trend in which employees increasingly bring their own phones to work.

One of them, MobileIron Inc., is...
